title: Curriculum Improvement Design for Enhancing HRD Professionals' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic HRD (Human Resource Development) concepts and organizational operations experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen HRD professionals' capabilities for responding to global economic crises, providing practice-centered education environments with simulations and VR technology for real-world problem solving

learning_goals: Learners can apply core competencies as HRD professionals—such as instructional design, leadership development, and coaching skills—in simulated environments.
Learners can diagnose HRD issues within organizations and propose improvement strategies in collaboration with technology-based tools.
Learners can evaluate the entire process—from planning to execution—of real-world HRD projects in VR-based scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
